skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: Ramayana is one of the two major Sanskrit epics of ancient India. So now let us test you with the whole life story of Lord Rama starting from Ayodhya, the death of the great king of Lanka Raavana, and Ram's eventual return to Ayodhya to be crowned king.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
